title: Why is ranked so wretchedly awful? (rant)
body:
Tilt doesn't even describe it. I try my best to do what I can as a jungler, and every game goes up in flames. Sure I am not amazing, I make tons of mistakes. We all do, but I have never in all my years of playing this game encountered something as asinine as the last 40 or so games I've played. cumulatively I've been able to win 10 out of 36 in the last two weeks. I get a lead early, I try to clear my jungle efficiently and focus on doing the most optimal things I can be... I try to shot call and warn my team about where the enemy jungler might be and when... and my match history looks like this...

beware... this isn't for the faint of heart...

http://na.op.gg/summoner/userName=General%20Elephant

part of the issue is me. I try too hard to wrestle back some form of control.... in doing so I often try to take higher risk plays in order to provide some breathing room. maybe I should stop trying to fight it, if my team wants to take troll picks and play like monkeys... I can't stop them. I can't dodge every game... and it is impossible for me to sit back idly by while everything falls apart. A lot of my games end in high deaths because by that point the enemy is so fed me being 4/2/5 doesn't cut it, so I just force myself to try to make something happen in last ditch efforts and die a couple times at the end while our base is in shambles and the enemy team is just playing with their food....

I was silver I 42 lp, and now i am silver IV 75 lp. over the course of the last two weeks. I guess silver is still just silver...
